entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:43 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries mixed with snow squalls early this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
